snippet: Photography policies vary widely among art museums, with the more restrictive ones citing the need to protect visitors’ experiences and the artist’s intellectual property, as well as the art itself.
abstract: Photography policies vary widely among art museums, with the more restrictive ones citing the need to protect visitors’ experiences and the artist’s intellectual property, as well as the art itself.
lead_paragraph: Photography policies vary widely among art museums, with the more restrictive ones citing the need to protect visitors’ experiences and the artist’s intellectual property, as well as the art itself.

headline.seo: Art Museums’ Photography Policies Vary Widely
headline.main: At Galleries, Cameras Find a Mixed Welcome
headline.print_headline: At Galleries, Cameras Find a Mixed Welcome
